result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Damian Carmona Jr.

records.addlTxt: Defense requests that case resolve globally with the defendant's pending felony matters in Branch 40.  Court rescheduled plea/sentencing hearing to January 17, 2023 at 3:00 pm in Branch 40.

Defendant Damian Carmona Jr. not in court, in custody.  Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court for Damian Carmona Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Nate Kristian McClure in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status. Counsel informs the Court that defendant has another pending matter in front of Judge Shelton and requests this case remain calendared in Br 13 and requests a plea and sentencing date. Case remains calendared in Br 13. Case adjourned.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.
CORRECTION: Judge Konkol presided over Branch 13 on August 30th, 2022

Defendant Damian Carmona Jr. not in court, in custody.  Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court for Damian Carmona Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a pre-trial conference. Discussion held. Defendant has a felony matter in Branch 40 and will be seeking a global offer and request the court to authorize transfer.
Court authorize transfer to Branch 40 for purposes of a global resolution, if accepted. 
Case adjourned for a status conference Br. 13.
Status conference scheduled for September 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Kohl's Department Store Sara G.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Damian Carmona in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Damian Carmona in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Damian Carmona appeared by video means with Attorney.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Triggiano, Branch 13.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned to Branch 13. Pretrial Conference scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 8:30AM.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
